name: Light In The Tunnel
description:
Trapped in a tunnel, you try to find your way out, try to find the light! It’s very dark, so you must light candles around the area using your lighter, and find codes scattered around the tunnels, and remember the codes given to use to open locked gates. Some of the notes only have 1 letter each, those could be put together in a combination to find the final gate’s secret code… Good luck and use a paper and pen if you need to! :))

This game was made for the LM0B Beginner's Game Jam #2 in 4 days (Time given was 5 days but I was one day late lol) so I apologize if there are bugs or inconsistencies in the game, please let me know in the comments if you find any thank you :> Also check out the game's soundtrack in it's own soundcloud playlist and also in my youtube channel!:

https://soundcloud.com/aris-paris-858771175/sets/light-in-the-tunnel-soundtrack

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoIa1ZiFR-PmmI94W-yP6hQ

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys : Left, Right, Back, Front Movement
  • Mouse : Look Around
  • Space : Pause Game
  • Walk In Front Of Candle : Light Candle
  • Click “Turn On Lighter” Button : Light Your Lighter
  • Walk In Front Of Key Code Note & Click “Open Note” Button : Open Note
  • Walk In Front Of Key Code Pad & Click “Enter Code” Button : Enter Code
  • Enter : Enter Code

(ALSO POTENTIAL BUG: SOMETIMES WHEN YOU ENTER THE CODE IT DOESN’T COUNT AS CORRECT EVEN WHEN IT IS SO BE SURE TO CLICK “Close Code” AND THEN MOVE AWAY AND MOVE BACK TO THE KEY PAD AND CLICK “Enter Code” AGAIN AND THEN IT WILL COUNT AS CORRECT AFTER THAT SORRY FOR THE BUG IDK HOW TO FIX IT)
